mapper.select:
/* custBgtByacctAprvl.selectCustBgtByacctAprv 계정별 결재선 관리 목록 조회 */ SELECT LL.* , LAG(LL.ID_CHK1) OVER (ORDER BY LL.BZPLC_ID, LL.APRVL_SET_SEQ, LL.APRVL_PST_CD, LL.APRV_SEQ) AS ID_CHK2 , CASE WHEN LENGTH(LL.APRVR_NM_N) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(LL.APRVR_NM_N,1,1) || LPAD('*',(LENGTH(LL.APRVR_NM_N)-1),'*') WHEN LENGTH(LL.APRVR_NM_N) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(LL.APRVR_NM_N,1,1) || LPAD('*',(LENGTH(LL.APRVR_NM_N)-2),'*') || SUBSTR(LL.APRVR_NM_N,3,1) ELSE SUBSTR(LL.APRVR_NM_N,1,2) || LPAD('*',(LENGTH(LL.APRVR_NM_N)-2),'*') END AS APRVR_NM , CASE WHEN LENGTH(LL.UPDPSN_N) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(LL.UPDPSN_N,1,1) || LPAD('*',(LENGTH(LL.UPDPSN_N)-1),'*') WHEN LENGTH(LL.UPDPSN_N) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(LL.UPDPSN_N,1,1) || LPAD('*',(LENGTH(LL.UPDPSN_N)-2),'*') || SUBSTR(LL.UPDPSN_N,3,1) ELSE SUBSTR(LL.UPDPSN_N,1,2) || LPAD('*',(LENGTH(LL.UPDPSN_N)-2),'*') END AS UPDPSN FROM (
SELECT '0' AS CHK , LIST.ID_VALUE AS ID_CHK1 , LIST.CO_CD , LIST.APRVL_SPR_CD , LIST.APRVL_SET_SEQ , LIST.BZPLC_ID , LIST.BZPLC_NM , LIST.DEPT_ID , LIST.DEPT_NM , LIST.ACCT_ID , LIST.ACCT_NM , LIST.STR_AMT , LIST.END_AMT , TO_NUMBER(LIST.APRV_SEQ) AS APRV_SEQ , LIST.APRVR_ID , LIST.APRVR_NM AS APRVR_NM_N , LIST.APRVL_PST_CD , LIST.UPDPSN AS UPDPSN_ID , NVL(M.OPRTR_NM, M2.MBR_NM) AS UPDPSN_N , LIST.UPD_DTM FROM( SELECT APR.CO_CD /* 회사코드 */ , APR.CO_CD || APR.BZPLC_ID || APR.APRVL_SPR_CD || APR.APRVL_SET_SEQ AS ID_VALUE , APR.PRD_ID /* 상품ID */ , APR.APRVL_SPR_CD /* 결재선구분코드 */ , APR.APRVL_SET_SEQ /* 결재선설정순번 */ , APR.BZPLC_ID /* 사업장ID */ , BZP.BZPLC_NM /* 사업장명 */ , APR.DEPT_ID /* 부서ID */ , DEP.DEPT_NM /* 부서명 */ , APR.ACCT_ID /* 계정ID */ , ACCT.ACCT_NM /* 계정명 */ , APR.STR_AMT /* 최소주문금액 */ , APR.END_AMT /* 최대주문금액 */ , CASE WHEN APRSET.APRV_SEQ > 90000 THEN APRSET.APRV_SEQ-90000 ELSE APRSET.APRV_SEQ END AS APRV_SEQ /* 결재 차수 */ , APRSET.APRVR_ID , NVL( M.MBR_NM, APRSET.APRVR_ID ) AS APRVR_NM /* 결재자 */ , APRSET.APRVL_PST_CD /* 최초/최종 */ , NVL(APR.UPDPSN_ID, APR.REGPSN_ID) AS UPDPSN /* 최종변경자 */ , NVL(APR.UPD_DTM, APR.REG_DTM) AS UPD_DTM /* 최종변경일시 */ FROM TB_CC_APRVL_SET_INFO APR
JOIN TB_OD_ODR_INQ_TGT_DTLS T1 ON T1.SES_ID = #{sesId} AND T1.INQ_COND_DTLS = #{inqCondDtls} AND T1.COL_ITM = 'BZPLC_ID' AND T1.COND_DATA_VAL = APR.BZPLC_ID
JOIN TB_OD_ODR_INQ_TGT_DTLS T2 ON T2.SES_ID = #{sesId} AND T2.INQ_COND_DTLS = #{inqCondDtls} AND T2.COL_ITM = 'PRD_ID' AND T2.COND_DATA_VAL = APR.PRD_ID
JOIN TB_OD_ODR_INQ_TGT_DTLS T4 ON T4.SES_ID = #{sesId} AND T4.INQ_COND_DTLS = #{inqCondDtls} AND T4.COL_ITM = 'DEPT_ID' AND T4.COND_DATA_VAL = APR.DEPT_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CC_BZPLC_BASIS BZP ON BZP.CO_CD = APR.CO_CD AND BZP.BZPLC_ID = APR.BZPLC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CC_DEPT_BASIS DEP ON DEP.CO_CD = APR.CO_CD AND DEP.DEPT_ID = APR.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CC_BGT_ACCT_BASIS ACCT ON ACCT.CO_CD = APR.CO_CD AND ACCT.ACCT_ID = APR.ACCT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CC_APRVL_SET_DTL APRSET ON APRSET.CO_CD = APR.CO_CD AND APRSET.BZPLC_ID = APR.BZPLC_ID AND APRSET.APRVL_SPR_CD = APR.APRVL_SPR_CD AND APRSET.APRVL_SET_SEQ = APR.APRVL_SET_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CC_MBR_BASIS M ON M.CO_CD = APRSET.CO_CD AND M.MBR_ID = APRSET.APRVR_ID WHERE APR.APRVL_SPR_CD = '50' )LIST
JOIN TB_OD_ODR_INQ_TGT_DTLS T3 ON T3.SES_ID = #{sesId} AND T3.INQ_COND_DTLS = #{inqCondDtls} AND T3.COL_ITM = 'ACCT_ID' AND T3.COND_DATA_VAL = LIST.APRVR_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CO_MBR_OPRTR_INFO M ON ( M.CO_CD = LIST.CO_CD AND M.OPRTR_ID = LIST.UPDPSN ) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CC_MBR_BASIS M2 ON ( M2.CO_CD = LIST.CO_CD AND M2.MBR_ID = LIST.UPDPSN )
ORDER BY ${sortColumn} ${sortType} , BZPLC_ID, DEPT_ID, APRVL_SET_SEQ, APRVL_PST_CD, APRV_SEQ
ORDER BY CO_CD, BZPLC_ID, APRVL_SPR_CD, APRVL_SET_SEQ, APRVL_PST_CD, APRV_SEQ
)LL

/* custBgtByacctAprvl.selectPopAprInfo 계정별 결재선 관리 조회 */ SELECT CO_CD , BZPLC_ID , #{bzplcId} AS BZPLC_NM , APRVL_SPR_CD , APRVL_SET_SEQ , DEPT_ID , #{deptId} AS DEPT_NM , ACCT_ID , STR_AMT , END_AMT FROM TB_CC_APRVL_SET_INFO WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND BZPLC_ID = #{bzplcId} AND APRVL_SPR_CD = '50' AND DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND ACCT_ID = #{acctId}

/* custBgtByacctAprvl.selectPopAprDetail 계정별 결재선 관리 상세 결재선조회 */ SELECT CASE WHEN APRV_SEQ > 90000 THEN APRV_SEQ-90000||'' ELSE APRV_SEQ||'' END AS DGR_CNT /* 결재 차수 */ , APRVR_ID AS MBR_ID /* 결재자ID */ , (SELECT M.MBR_NM FROM TB_CC_MBR_BASIS M WHERE M.CO_CD = CO_CD AND M.MBR_ID = APRVR_ID) AS MBR_NM /* 결재자명 */ , APRVL_PST_CD /* 최초/최종 */ , '0' AS CHK , APRVL_SPR_CD /* 결재선구분코드 */ , APRVL_SET_SEQ /* 결재선설정순번 */ , #{coCd} AS CO_CD , #{bzplcId} AS BZPLC_ID , ROWNUM||'' AS GROW FROM TB_CC_APRVL_SET_DTL WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND BZPLC_ID = #{bzplcId} AND APRVL_SPR_CD = #{aprvlSprCd} AND APRVL_SET_SEQ = #{aprvlSetSeq}

/* custBgtByacctAprvl.selectAcctList 계정별 결재선 관리 예산계정 조회 */ SELECT LPAD(' ', 2*(LEVEL-1)) || ACCT_NM AS ACCT_NM , ACCT_ID FROM ( SELECT ACCT_ID , ACCT_NM , HRNK_ACCT_ID , CO_CD FROM TB_CC_BGT_ACCT_BASIS ACTB WHERE ACTB.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND ACTB.BZPLC_ID = #{bzplcId} AND ACTB.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CC_BGT_ACCT_DEPT_MAPP WHERE CO_CD = ACTB.CO_CD AND BZPLC_ID = ACTB.BZPLC_ID AND ACCT_ID = ACTB.ACCT_ID AND DEPT_ID = #{deptId} ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR ACCT_ID = HRNK_ACCT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY ACCT_ID
mapper.insert: /* custBgtByacctAprvl.insertPopAprDetailHist 계정별 결재선 관리 상세 관리정보 이력 */ INSERT INTO TB_CC_APRVL_SET_INFO_HST( CO_CD , BZPLC_ID , APRVL_SPR_CD , APRVL_SET_SEQ , HST_SEQ , HST_SPR_CD , DEPT_ID , ACCT_ID , STR_AMT , END_AMT , USE_YN , REGPSN_ID , REG_DTM , UPDPSN_ID , UPD_DTM ) SELECT A.CO_CD , A.BZPLC_ID , A.APRVL_SPR_CD , A.APRVL_SET_SEQ , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(HST_SEQ), 0)+1 FROM TB_CC_APRVL_SET_INFO_HST WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND BZPLC_ID = #{bzplcId} AND APRVL_SPR_CD = #{aprvlSprCd} AND APRVL_SET_SEQ = #{aprvlSetSeq} ) , #{hstSprCd} , A.DEPT_ID , A.ACCT_ID , A.STR_AMT , A.END_AMT , A.USE_YN , A.REGPSN_ID , A.REG_DTM , A.UPDPSN_ID , A.UPD_DTM FROM TB_CC_APRVL_SET_INFO A WHERE A.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND A.BZPLC_ID = #{bzplcId} AND A.APRVL_SPR_CD = #{aprvlSprCd} AND A.APRVL_SET_SEQ = #{aprvlSetSeq}

/* custBgtByacctAprvl.saveByacctAprvlInfoHist 계정별 관리 상세 결재선정보 이력 */ INSERT INTO TB_CC_APRVL_SET_DTL_HST( CO_CD , BZPLC_ID , APRVL_SPR_CD , APRVL_SET_SEQ , APRV_SEQ , HST_SEQ , HST_SPR_CD , APRVL_PST_CD , APRVR_ID , REGPSN_ID , REG_DTM , UPDPSN_ID , UPD_DTM ) SELECT A.CO_CD , A.BZPLC_ID , A.APRVL_SPR_CD , A.APRVL_SET_SEQ , A.APRV_SEQ , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(HST_SEQ), 0)+1 FROM TB_CC_APRVL_SET_DTL_HST WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND BZPLC_ID = #{bzplcId} AND APRVL_SPR_CD = #{aprvlSprCd} AND APRVL_SET_SEQ = #{aprvlSetSeq} ) , #{hstSprCd} , A.APRVL_PST_CD , A.APRVR_ID , A.REGPSN_ID , A.REG_DTM , A.UPDPSN_ID , A.UPD_DTM FROM TB_CC_APRVL_SET_DTL A WHERE A.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND A.BZPLC_ID = #{bzplcId} AND A.APRVL_SPR_CD = #{aprvlSprCd} AND A.APRVL_SET_SEQ = #{aprvlSetSeq}
